query:
UPDATE presets p
            SET 
                rating = (
                    SELECT AVG(r.rating)::decimal(3,2)
                    FROM preset_ratings r
                    WHERE r.preset_id = p.id
                ),
                rating_count = (
                    SELECT COUNT(*)
                    FROM preset_ratings r
                    WHERE r.preset_id = p.id
                )
            WHERE p.id = $1
